events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this product is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong product delivered.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo showing the item clearly isn’t what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and arrange for a prepaid return shipment from your address.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate the help resolving this issue.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and a return shipping label has been emailed to you for the incorrect item.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and that the return process went smoothly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As the refund was successfully processed and customer confirmed satisfaction, this case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support.
